news.title: Doctors' strike disruption will be kept to a minimum, Streeting says as walkouts begin
news.summary: Hospitals in England battle to keep both emergency and non-urgent work going in five-day walkout.

news.title: Jay Slater's death in Tenerife was accidental after he fell from a height, coroner rules
news.summary: Jay Slater's friend Lucy Law begged him to get back to safety after he ventured off a mountain road.

news.title: Samaritans to close more than 100 branches
news.summary: The charity's chief executive says "at least half" of their branches will close in the UK and Ireland.

news.title: South Park creator makes mock apology to Trump after White House attacks episode
news.summary: "We're terribly sorry," says Trey Parker over an episode which the White House called "fourth-rate".

news.title: Former MP Mhairi Black announces she has left the SNP
news.summary: The SNP's former Westminster deputy leader said she disagreed with the party's stance on trans rights and Palestine.

news.title: Kelly Osbourne lost 'best friend' after father Ozzy's death
news.summary: She has made her first comments since her father's death at the age of 76 on Tuesday, posting lyrics from the song Changes.

news.title: Thailand warns clashes with Cambodia could 'move towards war'
news.summary: Intense fighting at the disputed border has killed at least 16 people and displaced tens of thousands.

news.title: Watch: Trump jokes he wants Powell to lower interest rates in tense exchange
news.summary: The US president and Federal Reserve chair bickered over the cost and timeline of the Fedâ€™s headquarters renovation project during a tour.

news.title: People who cannot eat gluten to be given cash cards to help pay for food
news.summary: One woman who took part in the pilot says it only "scratches the surface" of food bills.

news.title: Starmer under pressure to recognise Palestinian statehood
news.summary: It comes as French President Emmanuel Macron said France would recognise statehood in September.
